name: StoryADay

”Alexa, open The Story A Day Podcast”
”Alexa, start The Story A Day Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the story a day podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des: StoryADay began as a challenge to get people writing a story every day in May 2010. Since then it has grown into a destination site for writers on the web, one of Writer’s Digest Magazine’s “101 Best Websites for Writers” and one of their 20 favorite podcasts. Each episode of The StoryADay Podcast is packed with inspiration and practical tips to help you achieve your lifelong dream of being a writer.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
